title: OM House / AN NAM Architecture
description: OM House is a private villa for a family including parents, son, and daughter. Located in an urban area with a high density of buildings, adjacent to dusty and noisy highways, with the desire to find tranquility and harmony with nature, the house is designed with a closed facade and a big garden inside, creating a green space inside the city.
author: Valeria Silva
excerpt: Completed in 2025 in Vietnam. Images by Hiroyuki OKI. OM House is a private villa for a family including parents, son, and daughter. Located in an urban area with a high density of buildings, adjacent to...
